sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Rename process type to playbook type</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[// Change process type table label
gr = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
gr.addQuery('name', 'sys_pd_process_type');
gr.query();
if (gr.next()) {
	gr.setValue('label', 'Playbook Type');
	gr.update();
}
gr = new GlideRecord('sys_documentation');
gr.addQuery('name', 'sys_pd_process_type');
gr.query();
if (gr.next()) {
	gr.setValue('label', 'Playbook Type');
	gr.setValue('plural', 'Playbook Types');
	gr.update();
}
gr = new GlideRecord('sys_app_module');
gr.addQuery('name', 'sys_pd_process_type');
gr.query();
if (gr.next()) {
	gr.setValue('sys_name', 'Playbook Type');
	gr.update();
}

// Change process type label in panel override table
gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
gr.addQuery('name', 'sys_pd_panel_override');
gr.addQuery('element', 'process_type');
gr.query();
if (gr.next()) {
	gr.setValue('column_label', 'Playbook type');
	gr.update();
}
gr = new GlideRecord('sys_documentation');
gr.addQuery('name', 'sys_pd_panel_override');
gr.addQuery('element', 'process_type');
gr.query();
if (gr.next()) {
	gr.setValue('label', 'Playbook type');
	gr.setValue('plural', 'Playbook types');
	gr.update();
}

// Change process type label in process definition table
gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
gr.addQuery('name', 'sys_pd_process_definition');
gr.addQuery('element', 'process_type');
gr.query();
if (gr.next()) {
	gr.setValue('column_label', 'Playbook type');
	gr.update();
}
gr = new GlideRecord('sys_documentation');
gr.addQuery('name', 'sys_pd_process_definition');
gr.addQuery('element', 'process_type');
gr.query();
if (gr.next()) {
	gr.setValue('label', 'Playbook type');
	gr.setValue('plural', 'Playbook types');
	gr.update();
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2024-03-05 18:14:23</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8ffaf009b7348610255764fdde11a981</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Rename process type to playbook type</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Process Automation Designer Core - Model" source="com.glide.pad.core.model">0ae817db47220210cd4e1ce4316d431f</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_8ffaf009b7348610255764fdde11a981</sys_update_name>

        <sys_updated_on>2024-03-05 18:14:23</sys_updated_on>

    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
